website_summaries.verdict: Nike SB Air Max Stefan Janoski 2s are authentic streetwear kicks that provide unmatched comfort. The shoes have soft, stretchy uppers which are quite elastic so these don’t feel tight. The sneakers also weigh quite light, so feet won’t feel strained with prolonged use. It is a sneaker that is light on the feet, light on the wallet, and heavy in style.
pros: Nike SB Air Max Stefan Janoski 2 shoes provide a comfy fit that’s even better than the original release, plenty of users say
The shoes from the Nike brand are great for lifestyle use such as walking, bicycling, and walking, according to a small number of people
Some testers have reported being pleased that Nike SB Air Max Stefan Janoski 2 skate shoes weigh light at around 320 grams only per shoe
A handful of individuals have commended the uppers of the sneakers for being incredibly soft with a lot of flex
The shoes are a true fit, a few purchasers have reported
Many users have been impressed by the stylish versatility of the Air Max Stefan Janoski 2
cons: According to several reviewers, the first version had a wider width than Nike SB Air Max Stefan Janoski 2s
A few disappointed consumers do not like the plainer midsoles of these sneakers when compared to the first SB Air Max Stefan Janoski

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is the correct length, but the fabric of the shoe is super tight. At first I thought I ordered the wrong size, but turns out it's just a tight fit. I've been wearing them for a few weeks and I'm glad now that they are tight. If it was a looser fit I don't think they would be as comfortable. I love the shoe, love the look, and love the fit. Just be aware if you have a wide foot, these may not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Melton

customer_reviews.title: Basic but nice...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice basic shoe. I bought it for the design and aesthetics mainly the comfort is poor to be honest. It’s more comfortable then the first design though.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size. Not good for skating.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why these are even called skate shoes. Ome kickfil, and you'll have a hole in the material. The fit is so off as well. They were too long, yet too tight around the ankle. Like so tight I could barely get them on with the laces fully loosened.
customer_reviews.author: Amz Cstmr

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the title fool you, these are not skateboarding shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fabric from the pinky toe end of my right foot tore during my very first olli. For $150 I would expect a bit more. These are no more then slippers manufactured by Indonesian children with a Nike logo stamped on them. Avoid all the hype and get a pair of Etnies
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Pinky toe sticks out :-(
customer_reviews.text: Material is kinda too soft on front, I don't like the way my pinky comes out
customer_reviews.author: Nelson L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. He washed them several times. They hold up well!
customer_reviews.author: damon simmons

customer_reviews.title: Get the color right!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is great but not the color I expected. Would have been five stars but I did not receive the color I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The shoes fell apart to easy .
customer_reviews.text: The soles are falling off after 5 months of regular wear. Maybe it’s an off pair. Really comfortable. Poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fire and comfortable my favorite shoes to use for daily 👌🏽🔥
customer_reviews.author: Samuel mendez

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy joy joy
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. They truly did not disappoint. I would have to say though and this is always with the Nike brand. Order hLf a size larger then what your used to. I'm a 10 so I order a 10 1/2. Always go with the 1 foot thats larger then the other.
customer_reviews.author: Jizoe

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Jordan Air Incline Basketball Shoes
product_meta.description: - Style: lifestyle, sport - Cut/fit: slim - Heel: flat, - Cushioning: Nike Air - Closure: lacing - Insole: textile - Outsole: textured rubber outsole - Outer sole: cushioning synthetic, vision panel on heel - Collar/shaft: sockliner - lace round - Fully warm lined: - Extra laces: - Size information: - Pattern: solid - obermaterialtaschenschuhe textile - Lining material: textile - Occasion - Sport: running - contains nontextile parts of animal origin:
feature_bullets: The textile upper provides a breathable, sock-like fit.
The visible Max Air element in the heel provides cushioning with every step.
An auxetic traction profile ensures better pressure distribution.
A solid rubber outsole allows traction and durability.
The cover on the midfoot ensures a secure hold.
